description: This file defines a React functional component `RoutesPlaceholder` that simulates routing by rendering different views based on the `route` prop. It manages accessibility focus, conditionally renders UI components for various routes, and includes logic for modal overlays.

methods.name: RoutesPlaceholder({ route = 'home', onCloseLogin, onOpenSearch, onCloseSearch })
methods.description: A React functional component that renders different UI views based on the `route` prop, including modals and focus management.

ctags.name: RoutesPlaceholder
ctags.pattern: /^export function RoutesPlaceholder({ route = 'home', onCloseLogin, onOpenSearch, onCloseSearch })/
